resources.string: About category choice, a configuration to the members of the roles chosen categories are limited.\n\n There should be no restriction, so both fields (role selection and category selection) are to be left blank.
Selects the columns that are to be displayed in the list.\n\nInactive roles are marked with (*).
The bearing is here will appear in the display selection menu "Configuration selection ...".\n\nA configuration can be deleted by the contents of the field name is deleted.

Here any number of configurations can be created for the category report. In the display of the category report one of these configurations is selected using "Configuration selection..." as the basis for the presentation.
About the uninstall generated by the plugin entries can be deleted from the database.
Choose from the scope of the installation.\n\n***ATTENTION: This routine deletes only the entries in the Admidio database. Program files and the link in the menu will not be deleted! ***
Delete only data of the current organization.
- When you delete the data, an error has occurred..\n
- The created data has been cleared.\n
\nTo completely remove the plugin the program files and the menu entry must be removed.
- The table "adm_plugin_preferences" could not be deleted because it houses more data from other plugins.\n
Displayed text in case of no membership
Text on no membership in a role or category. \n(e.g. No or False).
Displayed text in case of membership
Text on membership in a role or category. \n(e.g. Yes or True or X).
Allows the documentation of the plugin can be opened (An existing Internet connection is required because the data is located on admidio.org).
Choose from the configuration that is to be exported. Export creates a file with the extension .cfg and the name of the configuration.
This configuration can be imported and exported for backup or distribution.
Choose the configuration that is to be imported (Note: It can be imported with the extension .cfg files only).
The selected file does not contain valid configuration data.
When uploading and checking file a general error occurred. Cause of error might as be a wrong file extension or a too large file.

The export / import function is primarily intended to save a configuration and restore it to the same environment. If the backup file is imported into another Admidio installation, different role IDs (e.g. role member has ID 23 in the 1st installation and ID 25 in the 2nd installation) could lead to an incorrect import.
The authorization check of the plugin failed. There is more than one menu item with the same URL defined.\n\n=> #VAR1_BOLD#
The respective checkbox has to be activated if you want to display at the end of the report a line with the number of memberships.
About roll select a configuration may be restricted to members of the selected roles.\n\n There should be no restriction, so both fields (role selection and category selection) are to be left blank.
